title: Himi 28
lyrics:
7’s
1.
’Eiki ‘oku mau holi
Ke mau ‘iate koe,
Pea ke mau ongo’i
‘A ho’o ngāue lelei.
2.
Pea mau hoko ‘o ma’u
Hono faka’ilonga
‘O ‘emau liliu loto
Mo ‘emau tupu fo’ou.
3.
‘Oku mau mafasia
‘I he maama mamahi,
Pea mau ngāueue
‘I he kavenga kovi.
4.
‘Oku mau manavahē
‘I he’emau ongo’i
Ko e kau houhau ia
Mo e tu’utāmaki.
5.
‘Eiki ‘Alo’ofa mai
Ki he kau loto vaivai,
Mo ke fakahaofi
‘A homau laumālie. *
